 So  really  go  fast/minimal  on  pre-processing  in  fact.”  -||-   “The  only  good  paper  about  SDR  I  have  in  mind  is  "SDR  -  half-baked  or  well  done?"  https://arxiv.org/abs/1811.02508 from  2018,  but  maybe  there  are  some  more  recent  ones  on  the  subject  There's  also  that  thesis  that  is  interesting  but  maybe  also  outdated  now  (as  based  on  the  old
